reviews.title: nice pre and post cruise

reviews.text: I booked this hotel stay with Expedia and the deal I found included breakfast for a price much better than my travel agent could find. My spouse and I stayed here before our cruise out of Miami. We had a lovely experience, friendly staff, a very LARGE room, comfortable bed, and no noise. In the morning we enjoyed a lovely breakfast buffet with fresh fruit and berries, and a good selection of hot dishes. Likely the best I've had in a hotel before! Above all, the room, lobby and dining area were very clean and well-kept.
reviews.title: Few complaints. Very good airport hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We arrived at Miami Airport, and went to level 2 to catch the Best Western Shuttle, it runs every 30 mins during the day, so you don't have to phone for a ride. We arrived at the hotel after a 10 min. drive and were greated with friendly smiles and wonderful atmosphere. Our room was very clean and tidy, the bed was the best I had ever slept in. We stayed there for two days before our cruise and had a chance to tour Miami. Publix & CVS were only two blocks down Flagler. We took the number 11 bus to downtown Miami, the cost was $2.00/ $1.00 senior rate. The bus stops near Bayside Market, which is a great place to visit with lots of places to eat, party, shop and book tours. the bus ride is about 40 mins. We booked our shuttle to the cruise line at Best Western for $10.00 per person, and with the driver for our return shuttle, we had to call him when our cruise ended, he was there in 10 min. We stayed one night after the cruise and again returned to Bayside and ate at the Hard Rock Cafe. When the time came to leave for the airport, the shuttle runs every 30 mins, so we just had to be at the front desk 10 mins before it left. I would stay at this Hotel again when I take another cruise.
reviews.title: Great Place To Stay

reviews.text: Great option near the airport, recent construction , good breakfast, modern room, wonderful beds. i can't remember anything bad about this place. will go back there every time i go to Miami.>
reviews.title: Excellent option

reviews.text: My friend and I stayed here prior to a cruise. We arrived at the Ft. Lauderdale airport and within 5-10 minutes were boarded for Miami. The hotel itself was beautiful,and safe, but the neighborhood left a little to be desired for 2 females traveling alone. There is a restaurant/bar on the premises. Drinks were $8.00 a piece, but they have a happy hour later on in the day. We ate lunch there as well as their buffet breakfast, which was MORE than adequate. Eggs, meat, fruits, juices. croissants, rolls, etc. We chose not to eat dinner there. Instead we walked across the street to the Burger King. Our room had a microwave and fridge. There was an outdoor pool, with a privacy fence, that several people ventured in to. It appeared clean and well kept. We didn't use it only because we were already packed for our cruise. Transportation to the cruise line was easy and timely for us, but a large group that was also "bussing" to a cruise ship appeared to be having difficulty I don't know if this is a function of the hotel, or the cruise lines.. Our only complaint was that I asked 2 different staff people at the desk if they had sharps containers for diabetics to put their disgards in and were told 'No, just put them in the garbage". I'm hoping they will read this and change their policy. I'm leaving the "location" portion "unclicked" because it's good location related to the cruise lines but just doesn't seem to be the best neighborhood, and I don't want to unduly influence people.
reviews.title: Pre-cruise hotel stay

reviews.text: I arrived late, they had my room ready, wonderfull room, great location, very close to airport, highways
reviews.title: good location in miami

reviews.text: After reading many of the mixed reviews, some people must be very hard to please!
reviews.title: Pleasntly surprised... Well worth the stay!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Large room with very nice decor. We were happy with our service from front desk, the shuttle driver was very helpful and told us how to get to various places nearby. The only complaint we had was the resturant was pricey. Overall the hotel is very nice and quiet.
reviews.title: Very nice hotel

reviews.text: Stayed here for a week on the 7th floor. Probably my worse experience. I have bad allergies and the ventilation on the 7th floor did not help. There is something wrong with the whole floor, the carpeting is very musty and have an unknown odor. I literally got so sick and couldn't breathe. I'm not sure about other floors but 7th is very bad. I'm not sure about this Best Western but I think the staff is very inexperience. The only good thing I can say about this hotel is decent breakfast but the menu never changed and shuttle to/from airport. Housekeeping is poor, they would clean 40% of the room if you stay more than one night, nothing is changed unless you ask for it. Restaurant food is mediocre, inexperience Chef/Cooks. Business Center is located right next to staff room so they would constantly slam the door. I regretfully chose this hotel out of so many choices. I totally disagree with the majority of the reviews. I will never stay here again, even if it was FREE. The room odor is so severe that I think I would literally get sick from mildew. Don't take the provided transportation, instead take a Taxi. They say it's cheaper but from experience, it is not. I was charged double the taxi price.
reviews.title: Horrible ventilation, musty,moldy room. Not new hotel at all.

reviews.text: We spent two nights in April 2012. The rooms were pretty clean and good size. Some staffs were pretty helpful. Enough parking, however it's far from getting things to eat. Overall it's good for what we paid. We will stay here again.
reviews.title: Pretty good, but nothing much to do.

reviews.text: We didn't try the restaurant after we read reviews about the services.
reviews.title: OK, but bad service from check in.

reviews.text: We got to Miami International Airport on March 27, 2012, and called the hotel for shuttle service. They had told us that shuttle service was running every half hour. Finally after one hour the shuttle came. Arriving to the hotel the clerk would not accept the confirmed price we had on our reservation. The clerk had a very bad attitude and we were tired after a day traveling, so we paid the extra $35.00. Next morning we got hold of the manager and he corrected the mistake and apologized for the clerks behavior.
reviews.title: Great Hotel (New)

reviews.title: New hotel, smelly room!

reviews.text: I was looking forward to staying at this hotel and has shopped around several websites to get the best price. I found the hotel to be cheaper by booking through Expedia and even got a breakfast for 2 inlcuded in the rate.
reviews.title: Close to airport

reviews.text: We took the hotel shuttle from the airport to the hotel. The driver was fine but the shuttle was unbearably hot and stuffy. Luckily, the hotel was just a a few minutes from the airport.
reviews.title: pleased

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: When I entered the hotel, I was impressed with the clean, modern and immaculate lobby.
reviews.title: Surprising Gem

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Upon entering the room, my wife and I were overwhelmed with the musty, moldy smell of the room. It was over bearing. Had we stayed for more then one night, we would have asked to see another room or would have checked out. Since we arrived late at night and checked out early in the morning, we just dealt with it.
reviews.title: Bad Experience

aka: Best Western Premier Miami International Airport Hotel And Suites
description: The BEST WESTERN PREMIER MIA Hotel & Suites is centrally located and accessible within minutes from the MIA airport and Port of Miami. This brand new concept features 144 smoke-free contemporary upscale rooms and suites. Guests may enjoy complimentary amenities such as transportation to/from MIA airport and Wi-Fi. Hotel also offers a full bar/restaurant, outdoor swimming pool, top of the line fitness center and business center.
